playn.core

Class StockInternalTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • pythagoras.f.AbstractTransform
      • pythagoras.f.AffineTransform
        • playn.core.StockInternalTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InternalTransform, pythagoras.f.Transform

    public class StockInternalTransform
extends pythagoras.f.AffineTransform
implements InternalTransform
    The default InternalTransform instance, used on non-JavaScript platforms.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static StockInternalTransform IDENTITY
      The identity transform, don't modify it!

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InternalTransform concatenate(float m00, float m01, float m10, float m11, float tx, float ty, float originX, float originY)
      Concatenates the supplied transform onto this transform, accounting for the specified origin offset.
      InternalTransform concatenate(pythagoras.f.Transform other, float originX, float originY)
      Concatenates the supplied layer transform onto this transform, accounting for the specified origin offset.
      InternalTransform copy()
      Returns a copy of this transform.
      float m00()
      Returns the m00 (x-scale) component of the affine transform matrix.
      float m01()
      Returns the m01 (y-shear) component of the affine transform matrix.
      float m10()
      Returns the m10 (x-shear) component of the affine transform matrix.
      float m11()
      Returns the m11 (y-scale) component of the affine transform matrix.
      InternalTransform preConcatenate(InternalTransform other)
      Pre-concatenates the supplied layer transform onto this transform.
      InternalTransform set(pythagoras.f.Transform other)
      Configures this transform to be equal to the supplied other.
